remarks: Value of the set or left-regular elements in a ring.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Mar-2015.)
statement:
rrgval.e $e |- E = ( RLReg ` R ) $.
rrgval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
rrgval.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
rrgval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
rrgval $p |- E = { x e. B | A. y e. B ( ( x .x. y ) = .0. -> y = .0. ) } $.
$d B x y $.
$d R x y $.
